title: Superior Pasta Company
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A family-run pasta shop in the South Philly Italian Market opened in 1948. Started offering a vegan line of products in 2014 which includes 3-cheese ravioli, porcini mushroom ravioli, meatballs, sausage scallopini, pasta (hand-cut linguini), potato gnocchi, marinara, port wine marinara, and wild mushroom marinara with Jersey tomatoes.
